archimate:Requirement.name: Must define data quailty standards
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Data Quality policy to score (or ‘kite-mark’) all business-critical datasets within the organisation, based on a regular assessment of selected dimensions and measurements of data quality, according to defined standards, as a means of determining whether that data is fit for purpose.
Educating and promoting the business value of data accuracy, to improve data quality.
